about_the_game:
Haven is an prototype & in-development crafting/survival game where the player must Survive with scarce resources and unravel the mystery of The Wither in a desolated world. This Demo is intended to be a snapshot of what is to come, while there are many features implemented, we will be updating and improving upon them based on community feedback.

Haven Features:
  • Health/Hunger/Stamina Systems.
  • Crafting.
  • Building.
  • Farming.
  • Animal Taming.
  • Melee and Ranged Combat.
  • Hot and Cold Climated Effects.

This is a very early-in-development cut of a game that our team has been working on since the beginning of 2024. The goal of this Demo/Prototype is to gather feedback on how the systems function for players so we can adjust and improve upon them in the future.

Please pardon our dust as we continue to iterate on the core skeleton of the survival experience.
